Html:
Is there a simple way to set the Y Axis Min and Max? I have an application where I want to display a range of -2000 to 2000

Thanks

Mark.

Mark,

You can set the chart display range 

Chart.Viewport.Visible = new DataRect(Chart.Viewport.Visible.XMin, -2000, Chart.Viewport.Visible.Width, 4000);

or you can set the viewport domain

Chart.Viewport.Domain = DataRect.Create(Double.MinValue, -2000, Double.MaxValue, 2000);

BTW, most activity related to D3 is now at http://d3future.codeplex.com/

 

Grant.
